SQL Formatter

Format and beautify SQL queries with customizable indentation and keyword capitalization.

FAQ

What SQL dialects are supported?

The formatter supports standard SQL syntax and common keywords from SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Oracle.

What formatting options are available?

You can choose indentation (2 spaces, 4 spaces, or tabs) and keyword capitalization (upper, lower, or preserve case).

Can I minify SQL?

Yes, use the 'Minify' button to remove all extra whitespace and create compact SQL.

Is my SQL sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser.
